I have an class that will draw vertically centered, line-wrapped text onto a 
background image.  We use this class to dynamically generate buttons for our 
web site.  I would like to add testing to the class that draws the text on 
the background image.  So far my only idea for testing a class like this is 
to visually inspect the results.  Any ideas on how one could use JUnit to 
test something like this?  I want to verify that the image generated by this 
class is in fact the background image with the given text and that it is 
vertically centered and that the line wrapping works as expected. 

A similar problem that would seem as difficult as above would be a class 
that modifies a sound file. 

Thanks,
Todd Chaffee
